definition: lit. so numerous that one could just bend down and pick them up (idiom)/fig. extremely common/easily available
see 一著不慎，滿盤皆輸|一着不慎，满盘皆输[yi1 zhao1 bu4 shen4 , man3 pan2 jie1 shu1]

sentences.english: Because of how you reacted in the morning.
sentences.chinese: 一切皆由你早上的反应而起。

sentences.english: When all men think alike, no man thinks very much.
sentences.chinese: 除夜家皆一样念的时间便出有人多念了。

sentences.english: A song is played back, the flower curtain.
sentences.chinese: 皆奏一枫曲，次年回首花谢幕。

sentences.english: All things change, and we change with them.
sentences.chinese: 万物皆变，吾人亦当以变应之。

sentences.english: In this dictionary both spelling is show when both is possible.
sentences.chinese: 在两种拼法皆可时，本词典将之一并列出。

sentences.english: My friends who got under the bed and under desks were crushed to death …
sentences.chinese: 我的友朋们，这些藏在床下，桌女下的人皆死了。

sentences.english: The world is so big, but you only have to slow down and look carefully to see that there is splendor everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 世界这么大，只要慢下脚步，用心去看，处处皆美景。

sentences.english: Around the sword light quickly gathered, the sword is pointing at me.
sentences.chinese: 四周的剑光又迅速聚来，刀剑皆指向我。

sentences.english: Both these books and those clothes are mine.
sentences.chinese: 那些书战那些衣服皆是我的。

sentences.english: Their projective lines for denoting time are straight.
Yad entrance mine market both showed a high consolidation positive trend.
sentences.chinese: 连日来进口矿市场皆呈现出高位盘整向上的趋势。

sentences.english: Both tumors were successfully resected without recurrence.
sentences.chinese: 二者皆经手术成功切除肿瘤且未再复发。

sentences.english: All of this is done under the aegis of the creator God of this universe.
sentences.chinese: 那统统皆正在阿谁宇宙的制物神的保护下完秤弈。

sentences.english: For everything there is a season, and a time for every matter under heaven.
sentences.chinese: 凡事都有定期，天下万务皆有定时。

sentences.english: Everythingthe light touches is our kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 阳光普照之处皆是我们的国土。

sentences.english: Ming Fei and Hu children married early, felt two hundred cars were Orchid.
sentences.chinese: 明妃初嫁与胡儿，毡车百两皆胡姬。

definition: none doesn't/there is none who isn't/everyone
entirely/without exception/(literary) to be together/to be alike
to be all the same way (literary)
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
